segments.text: This looks like a very nice house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , I fell in love with this house the first moment I laid eyes on it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The style of the exterior is just what I ’ Ve been looking for !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The exterior is only half of the story . The interior is incredible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This home is gorgeous on the inside !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everything that you see on the walls , floors , and windows is brand new .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The wall colors totally suit the style of this house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Straight ahead is the gourmet kitchen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love the bamboo flooring and granite countertops .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The master suite is the best . Let ’ s go look at that next .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is plenty of room for our king-sized bed , and I love the light in this room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know that you like this house , but let ’ s take a look at the others before you make up your mind .
segments.speaker: S2
